title: Samsung Galaxy Note 10 & 10 Plus Hands On
description: The Samsung Galaxy Note 10 and Note 10 Plus have been revealed and we're going to take a bit more critical hands on look at them.  This isn't a review of what could be a great duo of 2019 smartphones with amazing specs.  But now that there's been time to look at Samsung's presentation, some things about the price, specs other differences between the Note 10 and Note 10+ need some tough questions....  Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:  Blade Pro 17:   Razer Core X eGPU:   Blade 13 Graphics:   Blade 13 Base:    Subscribe    Samsung Canada provided a paid trip and accommodations in New York for the Unpacked event . This video is sponsored by Razer. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no video direction was received from manufacturer.   As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases.   Gear list (Available on Amazon):  Main Camera -  Main Lens -  Main Camera Mic -  Second Camera -  $700 Camera (Panasonic G7) -  Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 -  Cinevate DUZI Slider -  AKG C314 -  AKG C 568 B -  Zoom H5 -  ------------------------------------------------------------ Our full site:  Join Our Forums:   Follow us for more updates! Twitter  FaceBook  Instagram  -------------------------------------------------------  #galaxynote10 #galaxynote10+ #note10plus #hardwarecanucks
